attributes.additional_details:
Save Lutterworth's Police Station. It's the oldest Police Station in the country serving Lutterworth and surrounding villages.

The area has grown so much since 1967 when we came here and Lutterworth had back then 5 full time policeman. Now we are even bigger we are having the police station taken away.

Response from Market Harborough takes on average 45 minutes to get to Lutterworth. If they come at all...
